content:
We want to make you aware of the upcoming virtual connectathon that will take place on April 14-15, 2021. Connectathon attendees will have the opportunity for hands-on testing of the CARIN Consumer Directed Payer Data Exchange (CARIN IG for Blue Button®) Implementation Guide, learn more about the IG, and have the opportunity to ask the IG developers questions. We have received confirmation from many of the major payers in the U.S. that they will be participating. We are looking for additional clients and servers to participate. The event is free for all attendees to attend. We also anticipate testing other consumer-focused IGs from the HL7 patient workgroup. @Debi Willis @Virginia Lorenzi @Dave deBronkart

We will hold an Information Session in early April to help prepare participants for the Connectathon. If you have questions or would like to participate, please contact @Mark Roberts.

Please sign up for the CARIN IG for Blue Button® track here: http://bit.ly/CARINSignUp
Please sign up for the CARIN IG for Blue Button® track here http://bit.ly/ZulipCARIN
A Track Page can be found here: http://bit.ly/TrackPageCARIN
Connectathon Zoom https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/92253014741?pwd=OWdBcXAzYi9VdlpwdjdjTlBvbnNGZz09 Password: 716820

We will hold an Information Session to provide an overview of the CARIN Connectathon on April 7 at 1 pm ET. We also answered a number of questions that might be helpful as you prepare for the Connectathon.

Zoom: https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/98473934855?pwd=ZzdWRkRzcHBFdHRyT0VJS1ovczNJUT09 Password: 403384

Draft Track Schedule (all times ET)
Times and sessions are subject to change

Wednesday April 14
11:00 AM – 11:30 AM Kick Off
11:30 AM – 12:30 PM CARIN IG Technical Overview
12:30 PM – 01:00 PM Ask IG Leads Anything
01:00 PM – 01:15 PM Break
01:15 PM – 02:00 PM Aegis Touchstone Overview & Q/A
02:00 PM – 05:00 PM Client-Server Testing w/ Breakout Rooms
05:00 PM – 06:00 PM Ask the SMART App Launch Developers Anything

Thursday April 15
11:00 AM – 11:30 AM Ask IG Leads Anything
11:30 AM – 02:00 PM Client-Server Testing w/ Breakout Rooms
02:00 PM – 03:00 PM Demos/Lessons Learned From Servers & Clients/Client-Server Testing
03:00 PM – 03:30 PM Wrap-up and Report Out
This makes me think Zulip should have a calendar.
I see a confluence account is needed which requires approval before I can add myself to the participants @Mark Roberts . Could you add it for me?

Hello Alan,

The Confluence account is free and you should receive approval fairly quickly. You will need an account going forward as HL7 is migrating a lot there, so definitely worth creating one now. Let me know if you don’t receive your login info today and I can nudge the HL7 folks.

Thanks!
Mark

We want to remind everyone that we will hold an Information Session to provide an overview of the CARIN Connectathon at 1 pm ET TODAY. We also answered a number of questions that might be helpful as you prepare for the Connectathon.
Zoom: https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/98473934855?pwd=ZzdWRkRzcHBFdHRyT0VJS1ovczNJUT09 Password: 403384

A recording of the session can be found here:
https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/rec/share/bUqShiiqiIKd_wru2OkXJaJ02ESwb2Y30Hbf7_TGnJUsfJOjxfw8xLQEECnlZxQ.k6RkpGuacT9tqLij Passcode: s%.fWXk1
I have signed up my team and myself to participate but do not see their names listed in "Client App Developers". Did I do something wrong? I am with Humetrix

Have you tried editing the Confluence page here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=104568756
Can you try one more time? You have to enter each person into a row.
@Mark Roberts Are you posting the Zoom fo the Connect-a-thon here? I have the info session links but not the main one.

Connectathon information can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=104568791
Zoom link included.

Corey Spears said:

Connectathon information can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=104568791
Zoom link included.

Thanks @Corey Spears

Hello @Mark Roberts @Ryan Howells and others. I wanted to let you all know that the issues experienced with our sandbox, at https://smart.oauth2.org have been resolved. I am inviting anyone who is interested to give it another go. Developer signup begin here: https://id.verifymyidentity.com/accounts/create-agent-account/CARIN-Connect-A-thon/ If you attempted last connect-a-thon I've also sent you an email. Contact me at 304-685-3137 or 304-685-3137 with any issues or questions.
Great! Will you be at the May HL7 Connectathon?
